name: oxox
description:
Famous board game on leisure time.
Player with 10 cards initially to put on 4 rows, one card each time. The row to put depends on the value of the card, which must be larger than the largest card on the row. When the put position exceeds a certain threshold, that player need to accept all the cards on that row. In case the card value is smaller than any of the cards in the 4 rows, player need to decide which to row to put and accept the cards. Each card has different number of "dogs" value. The one with minimum total number of "dogs" value will be the winner. Please refer to https://youtu.be/MqlA83nQ4Og for detail instruction.
